content: **details** * pattern consists of 32 rounds * level is advanced * stitches/terms slip_stitch skip chain single_crochet double_crochet tc csdc bl blo fp bp cluster popcorn decrease and small picot * this pattern contains a complete photo-tutorial and a link to a stitch video for round 7 -------------------------------- **languages** * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri * * *persian/فارسی language translation provided by maryam amiri * * *spanish/espanol language translation and testing provided by virginia padilla and tere gomis * ---------------------------------- **community** join our discussion and support group on facebook 2 join our discord channel 3 *thank you so very much to my lovely testers on this pattern cille heckenbach linda o brien margaret schwerin and siva oduri * 1 http //www emilyandthe com/pattern-translator-application 2 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 3 https //discord gg/atndgvj
